candidateActions(List<BasicAction>, List<CompoundAction>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
This method returns a stream of Optional of Tuples of Compound Actions and an Integer, where the Tuple indicate in the compound actions the possible BasicActions that are available
candidateBasicActions(List<BasicAction>, List<CompoundAction>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
This private method calculate the possible BasicActions the player can do
canPerformAction(Player, BasicAction, List<Block>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
Returns true if the player can do the given action
